field.filter: SELECT Cluster AS c WHERE c.type = 'Router'
SELECT ApplicationSolution AS app JOIN lnkContactToApplicationSolution AS l ON l.applicationsolution_id = app.id WHERE l.contact_id = :current_contact_id
SELECT Server AS S WHERE S.location_id=:this->location_id

menu.oql: SELECT Domain AS d JOIN lnkApplicationSolutionToFunctionalCI AS l ON l.functionalci_id=d.id JOIN ApplicationSolution AS app ON l.applicationsolution_id=app.id JOIN lnkContactToApplicationSolution AS ll ON ll.applicationsolution_id=app.id WHERE ll.contact_id=:current_contact_id
SELECT Url AS d JOIN ApplicationSolution AS app ON d.applicationsolution_id=app.id JOIN lnkContactToApplicationSolution AS l ON l.applicationsolution_id=app.id WHERE l.contact_id=:current_contact_id

profile.name: 配置经理
profile.description: 配置经理是修改维护CMDB配置项的人

profile.name: 变更审批
profile.description: 变更审批者是能影响变更审批的人
Portal user(门户用户)能访问iTop门户。不具有其它任何标准应用访问权限的人，将被自动重定向到用户门户
高级门户用户是能够查看某个用户下所有票单的人。它还必须具有其它角色，如门户用户的角色

profile.name: 只读用户
profile.description: 只读方式浏览CMDB并发起工单

profile.name: 研发
profile.description: 允许修改Person类，并通过DoCheckToWrite控制只能修改自己link的Person
